item.title: Panagrams and Phython
item.description: Panagrams and Phython So, we have also been learning about the coding language phython in my Computational Biology class over the last two weeks and one of the functions we have made in class is count_chars. I think function is really cool because it can check validity of panagrams without having to do it manually.A panagram is a sentence in which every letter of the english alphabet is used in the sentence.
